channel.title: Help!

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Feel_No_Pain Feel No Pain
item.description:
@Feel_No_Pain wrote:

When I try to compile my client, it says:

Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: REcompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

And this is my compiler:

@echo off
@TITLE Clawz Pkz Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You Havent Downloaded Java :P…
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic
